prompt:
Generate surface form variations for entity matching.

TERM: udel\nCONTEXT: how big is not about udel

GENERATE:
- Case variations (lowercase, uppercase, title case)
- Plural/singular forms
- Common abbreviations
- Synonyms referring to the same concept
- Common misspellings (if any)

OUTPUT FORMAT (JSON):
{
  "term": "udel",
  "variations": ["variation1", "variation2", ...],
  "synonyms": ["synonym1", "synonym2", ...],
  "abbreviations": ["abbr1", ...]
}

Provide ONLY the JSON output.
response:
{
  "term": "udel",
  "variations": [
    "udel",
    "UDEL",
    "Udel",
    "uDel",
    "UDel",
    "UDel.",
    "u-del",
    "u del"
  ],
  "synonyms": [
    "University of Delaware",
    "Delaware University"
  ],
  "abbreviations": [
    "UD",
    "U of D",
    "UofD",
    "U. of D.",
    "U of Delaware",
    "UofDel",
    "U. of Del.",
    "Univ. of Delaware",
    "Univ of Delaware",
    "Univ. of Del.",
    "Univ of Del."
  ]
}
